answers.answer: im pretty sure most doctors wont induce before ur due date... unless there is a medical reason but not sure what conditions would warrant it....

Usually they would only induce you prior to 40 weeks if you had a medical necessity for it, such as an emergency for your health or baby's health. I believe some doctors MIGHT be willing to induce women a few days prior, but most doctors won't really mess with induction until after 40 weeks, or maybe on the 40 week mark exactly.I'd talk to your doctor about their beliefs, and what they practice in reference to induction.
I was induced at 39 weeks with my first and will be with my second also
I was induced a week before due date.
They can even induce you if the baby is getting to big, or if your having health problems I think it's 30+ to get induced

question: When can you be induced or what causes a dr to induce before 40weeks
